name: Flag signals - Warning of slow moving vehicle
description: Warns a road user to proceed slowly and be alert due to a slow moving vehicle.

name: Flag signals – Slow Down
description: Flag signal to warn motorists to slow down.

name: Flag signals – Proceed
description: Flag signal to proceed - indicating to the driver that he or she shall proceed when the flag signal is displayed.

name: Flag signals – Stop
description: Flag signal to stop - indicating to the driver of a vehicle that he or she shall stop until the proceed flag signal is displayed

name: Flag signals - Warning flag signal
description: Warns a road user to proceed slowly and be alert.

name: Control handsignals for use by traffic officers
description: Go/Proceed - Indicates to the driver that he/she may proceed

name: Control handsignals for use by traffic officers
description: Go/Proceed - Indicates to the driver that he/she may proceed

name: Control handsignals for use by traffic officers
description: Stop – Stop traffic approaching from the front and rear

name: Control handsignals for use by traffic officers
description: Stop – Stop traffic approaching from the rear

name: Control handsignals for use by traffic officers
description: Stop – Stop traffic approaching from the front

name: Traffic lights
description: Act as for 4-way stop & yield right of way to pedestrians

name: Traffic lights
description: Indicates to pedestrians to remain stationary on the sidewalk until a green man signal is displayed

name: Traffic lights
description: Indicates to pedestrians that they may cross junction within markings. Drivers of vehicles must yield right of way to such pedestrians

name: Traffic lights
description: 1 Persons that have not yet started to cross road to remain stationary 2 who are within a pedestrian crossing that a steady red man signal will follow soon

name: Traffic lights
description: Stop vehicle behind line until green signal is displayed, then proceed with caution

name: Traffic lights
description: Indicates to the driver of a vehicle that the lane ahead is closed & that he/she shall leave the lane in the direction of the arrow when it is safe to do so

name: Traffic lights
description: Vehicles shall not be driven in a lane over which a red cross is displayed

name: Traffic lights
description: Vehicles may be driven in a lane over which a green arrow is displayed

name: Traffic lights
description: Indicates the approach of a train & the driver of a vehicle shall stop his/her vehicle & shall not proceed until the signals cease to flash, & it is safe to do so

name: Traffic lights
description: Drivers must stop before signal & not proceed until it is safe to do so

name: Traffic lights
description: Proceed in direction of arrow which is displayed together with a steady red disc signal for traffic travelling in the opposite direction

name: Traffic lights
description: Proceed only in direction of arrow, subject to restricting road signs & yield right of way to other traffic & pedestrians who are lawfully within junction

name: Traffic lights
description: Proceed through junction in any direction, subject to restricting road signs & yield right of way to other traffic & pedestrians who are lawfully within junction

name: Traffic lights
description: Prepare to stop vehicle behind line, if it is intended to turn in the direction of the arrow, & remain stationary until a green signal is displayed

name: Traffic lights
description: Proceed with caution & yield right of way to pedestrians

name: Traffic lights
description: Prepare to stop vehicle behind line & remain stationary until a green signal is displayed

name: Traffic lights
description: Stop vehicle behind line, if it is intended to turn left at the junction he/she may do so even though red disc signal is displayed, & shall yield right of way to all vehicles & pedestrians for whom a green light signal is displayed

name: Traffic lights
description: Stop vehicle behind line, turn left only if it is safe to do so & yield to traffic & pedestrians for whom a green signal is displayed
